name: InsightsAlley
0:
”Alexa, launch insights alley podcast”
”Alexa, open insights alley podcast”
”Alexa, start insights alley podcast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: insights alley podcast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Startup, Product, Growth, Sales & Strategy Insights for Entrepreneurs. Learn how to succeed in building and growing your product and startup with insights from proven founders and experts.
NOTE:
As soon as you open/launch the podcast, you will be playing the latest episode by default, but you can always find something more specific. Read HOW TO USE instructions below

HOW TO USE:
To Get Started: Say "Alexa, open ‘insights alley podcast’”.

Next/Previous:
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

Fast Forward:
If you want to skip ahead, you can say "Alexa, ask ‘insights alley podcast’ to fast forward 2 minutes"

Rewind:
if you want to go back, you can say "Alexa, ask ‘insights alley podcast’ to rewind 30 seconds"

Specific Episode:
You can also use ‘Episode No’ to play specific episodes
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
